text: The 2016 Pac-12 Conference men's soccer season was the 17th season of men's varsity soccer in the conference. The Stanford Cardinal are the defending champions, by virtue of winning the regular season (there is no conference tournament). The Cardinal are also the defending NCAA champions. == Changes from 2015 == * None == Teams == === Stadiums and locations === {| class="wikitable sortable" style="text-align: left;" ! Team ! Location ! Stadium !
